Text: Norton 2010 just detected it as spyware. Install at your own risk!

Crack recognized as a trojan by 28/41 scanners on virustotal.

Other red flags:
- torrent is a rar file, with a zip file in the rar file
- text document inside is called "read me ho!" and says "come check us out, or be gay and don't"

Get the picture?
